participants.name: Olena Kopelziw
participants.description: Studied at American Institute of Alternative Medicine
participants.url: Went to Grandview Heights High School (Columbus, Ohio)

messages.message:
Brian, help! Im trying to get on Iga's page and i cant find her heres the message i tried sending her VIP services cuz its all i could find ???
Hey, you beautiful bride! It's your Ohio mama. Why is it that I can't find your personal page only this amazingly impressive body of your artwork ? Please let me back in. Mama wants to see pictures! Love you, mama olena!!!
